locations.name: Male Atoll (Resort Area)
locations.description: Initial stay near the capital, offering the classic Maldivian overwater villa experience with convenient access and vibrant house reefs. Often located in North or South Male Atoll.

locations.name: Baa Atoll
locations.description: A UNESCO Biosphere Reserve known for incredible marine biodiversity, particularly manta ray sightings at Hanifaru Bay (seasonal), exceptional diving, and pristine natural beauty.
